manifest.author: Dale de Silva
manifest.name: Google Keep Import
manifest.description: Imports Google Keep backup files and attachments. Can also be used to import other files. Use the official Obsidian Importer plugin instead unless you need additional customisation of character mapping or importing of extraneous files.

manifest.author: Dimitar Dimitrov
manifest.name: Obligator
